TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Vbc extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ManagedCompiler

summary.span: 实现 Vbc 任务。

span.span: Implements the Vbc task.

summary.span: 使用项目文件中的 Vbc 元素创建和执行此任务。

span.span: Use the Vbc element in your project file to create and execute this task.

summary.span: 有关用法和参数信息，请参阅 [Vbc 任务](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/595278b1-2782-4577-b1ba-b4b5ab5625a3)。

span.span: For usage and parameter information, see [Vbc Task](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/595278b1-2782-4577-b1ba-b4b5ab5625a3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果主机对象传递给此方法将会调用在执行期间`Vbc`任务。This method will get called during execution if a host object was passed to the `Vbc` task.

span.span: Gets or sets one or more warnings to suppress that are specified by the numeric part of the warning identifier.

value.span: 由警告标识符数字部分所指定的一条或多条要取消显示的警告。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多个警告之间用分号分隔。Multiple warnings are separated by semicolons.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DocumentationFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 打开文档注释处理，并获取或设置输出文档 XML 文件。

span.span: Turns on documentation comments processing and gets or sets the output documentation XML file.

value.span: 输出文档 XML 文件。

span.span: The output documentation XML file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性将替代属性。This property overrides the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ErrorReport { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串值，该值指定任务将如何报告内部编译器错误。

span.span: Gets or sets a string value that specifies how the task will report internal compiler errors.

value.span: 指定任务将如何报告内部编译器错误的字符串值。

span.span: A string value that specifies how the task will report internal compiler errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以具有以下值：This property can have the following values: - `prompt` - `send` - `none` 如果`prompt`指定和内部编译器错误发生，则会提示用户是否向 Microsoft 发送错误数据的选项。If `prompt` is specified and an internal compiler error occurs, the user is prompted with an option of whether to send the error data to Microsoft. 如果指定了 `send`，且发生内部编译器错误，则该任务会向 Microsoft 发送错误数据。If `send` is specified and an internal compiler error occurs, the task sends the error data to Microsoft. 默认值是 `none`，它仅在文本输出中报告错误。The default value is `none`, which reports errors in text output only.

summary.span: 在编译器完成后，重写执行因此我们可以移动 PDB 文件（如果我们需要）。

span.span: Override Execute so that we can move the PDB file, if we need to, after the compiler is done.
Returns .

value.span: 如果Vbc任务文档注释处理到一个 XML 文件; 否则为。

span.span: if the Vbc task processes documentation comments to a XML file; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输出 XML 文件的名称是可执行文件或创建任务的库的名称。The name of the output XML file is the name of the executable file or the library that the task is creating.

span.span: A host object initialization status value that indicates what the next action should be.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void LogEventsFromTextOutput (string singleLine, Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance messageImportance);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void LogEventsFromTextOutput(string singleLine, valuetype Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance messageImportance) cil managed
protected: override void LogEventsFromTextOutput(System::String ^ singleLine, Microsoft::Build::Framework::MessageImportance messageImportance);

param.name: singleLine
param.span: 从 vbc 编译器的 STDOUT 捕获的单行

span.span: A single line captured from the STDOUT of the vbc compiler

param.name: messageImportance
param.span: 消息的重要性：高、低或正常

span.span: The message importance: High,Low, or Normal

summary.span: 此方法截获要记录的来自 VBC 的 STDOUT 的行。

span.span: This method intercepts the lines to be logged coming from STDOUT from VBC.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一次标准 vb 警告或错误，请参见我们，我们将其捕获并获取下一步 3 行，以便我们可以将转换的字符串形式的 FileName.vb(line,column) 这将使我们能够向 IDE 中报告的行和列的 FileName.vb(line) 窗体并因此筛选多目标的重复情况中的错误或只是波形曲线而不是整个行的相应令牌。Once we see a standard vb warning or error, then we capture it and grab the next 3 lines so we can transform the string form the form of FileName.vb(line) to FileName.vb(line,column) which will allow us to report the line and column to the IDE, and thus filter the error in the duplicate case for multi-targeting, or just squiggle the appropriate token instead of the entire line.

span.span: The name of the assembly that this module will be a part of.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ OptionCompare { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串值，该值指定如何进行字符串比较。

span.span: Gets or sets a string value that specifies how string comparisons are made.

value.span: 指定如何进行字符串比较的字符串值。

span.span: A string value that specifies how string comparisons are made.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以具有以下值：This property can have the following values: - `binary` - `text` 值 `binary` 指定该任务使用二进制字符串比较。The value `binary` specifies that the task uses binary string comparisons. 值 `text` 指定该任务使用文本字符串比较。The value `text` specifies that the task uses text string comparisons. 默认值为 `binary`。The default value is `binary`.
